#summary Console command: delete
#labels console,sql

= Delete =

Delete one or more records from the current database.

== Syntax ==

{{{delete from <class|cluster:<cluster>> [where <conditions>]}}}

== Example ==

{{{
> delete from Profile where nick is null

Deleted 123 record(s) in 0,012000 sec(s).
}}}

To know more about the SQL syntax used in Orient take a look to: [SQLQuery SQL Query].

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
